subtitleNullable: Texts by columnists in Turkish newspapers
descriptionNullable:
In this study, 10 columnists from each of four different newspapers published both in print and online were identified. A total of 10 columns by each author were recorded. A total of 400 columns were obtained. These articles are presented as a database consisting of Author Name, Newspaper, Column, Date columns. The data were obtained between 28.07.2015 and 08.12.2017. Newspapers and columnists are from Turkey and belong to the Turkish language.

To use the data in this study, it is necessary to refer to the following study.
- Aydemir, E. (2019). Türkçe Köşe Yazılarında Yapay Sinir Ağlarıyla Yazar ve Gazete Tahmin Etme. DÜMF Mühendislik Dergisi, 10(1), 45–56. DOI: https://doi.org/10.24012/dumf.425754
title: Corner Posts in Newspapers
